data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Victoria have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jorge Perez signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Necaxa's half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for Necaxa, close to Mazatlan's area.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Mazatlan.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
In the minute 8, Necaxa needs to be cautious. Mazatlan have an attacking throw-in.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 12, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Necaxa.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 18, Mazatlan have a dangerous throw-in.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 21, Jorge Perez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
In the minute 22, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Throw-in for Necaxa close to the penalty box.
Jorge Perez awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Necaxa are pushing forward but Juan Delgado's finish is wide of the goal.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Mazatlan.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 32, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Mazatlan's Fernando Aristeguieta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
In the minute 37, Israel Jimenez is booked for the away team.
Jorge Perez awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Necaxa have been given a penalty at Estadio Victoria...
In the minute 43, Lucas Passerini converts the penalty to give Necaxa a 1-0 lead.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 45, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Fernando Aristeguieta for Mazatlan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Necaxa.
In Aguascalientes Mazatlan attack through Luis Mendoza. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Necaxa have a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Necaxa's Julio Gonzalez has been booked in Aguascalientes.
Jorge Perez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Mazatlan are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 50, Mazatlan's Fernando Aristeguieta breaks free at Estadio Victoria. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Mazatlan drive forward but Mario Osuna is judged offside.
In the minute 52, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio Victoria.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 54, Jorge Perez awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Martin Rodriguez is replacing Miguel Sansores for Mazatlan at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 58, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal is replacing Israel Jimenez for the away team.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 64, The home team have replaced Joao Rodriguez with Jose Cobian. This is the first substitution made today by Luis Alfonso Sosa.
Ian Gonzalez is on a sub for Martin Barragan for Necaxa.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick Necaxa.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 76, Jorge Perez awards Necaxa a goal kick.
The away team replace Mario Osuna with Roberto Meraz.
Mazatlan make their fourth substitution with Candido Ramirez replacing Luis Mendoza.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Necaxa.
Aldo Rocha (Mazatlan) has received a yellow card from Jorge Perez.
In the minute 80, In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 82, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Claudio Baeza (Necaxa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Aldo Rocha for the away team is judged to be offside.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Aguascalientes.
Jorge Perez signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Mazatlan's Fernando Aristeguieta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Necaxa.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Jorge Perez awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match has come to a close in Aguascalientes. The final score is 1-0.
Luis Alfonso Sosa (Necaxa) is making a third substitution, with Maximiliano Salas replacing Lucas Passerini.
Ricardo Marin is on a sub for Efrain Velarde for Mazatlan.
Luis Alfonso Sosa is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Victoria with Mario De Luna replacing Juan Delgado.
Ian Gonzalez (Necaxa) gets a yellow card.
